content.name: Bug Off
content.description: Bugs are annoying be it in the real world or the computing world. Think you have what it takes to run a code without errors, here's your chance!
rules: Participants must have basic knowledge of C/C++.
oIt's a quiz round which consists of 15 basic code snippets and debugging  MCQâ€™s.
The qualified team will have to debug the set of programs which will have logical/syntactical errors.
The programs are written only in C/C++ and all the test cases have to be cleared.
The team which debugs the maximum number of programs within given time is crowned as the winner.
